meanings.definition: A type of cigar that is long and thin.
meanings.sent1: I saw a panetela in the store, and it looked very long and thin.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman enjoyed smoking a panetela after dinner.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was surprised to see a panetela as a party favor.
meanings.sent4: The smoke from the panetela curled gracefully in the air.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the panetela lingered in the room long after it was smoked.

meanings.definition: A type of sponge cake that is rolled into a cylinder shape.
meanings.sent1: The bakery displayed a delicious panetela in the window.
meanings.sent2: For dessert, we had a light and fluffy panetela with strawberries.
meanings.sent3: The panetela cake was so soft, it felt like a cloud in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The panetela cake rolled out of the oven like a golden log.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of the panetela filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: A type of pastry that is long and thin.
meanings.sent1: The bakery offered a delicious panetela made with flaky pastry.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed a panetela with her coffee, savoring each bite.
meanings.sent3: The panetela pastry was so delicate, it melted in her mouth.
meanings.sent4: The layers of the panetela pastry were as thin as paper.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the panetela shone under the bakery lights.
